Chap ter 7 
7.2 If the upper middle house on the cover of the book is the original. find something 
nonlinear in !he ltansformations of the other eight houses. 
7.3 If a linear transformation takes every vector in the input basis into the next basis vector 
(and the last into zero). what is its matrix? 
7.4 Suppose we change from the standard basis (the columns of I) to the basis given by 
the column. of A (invenible matri~). What is the change of basi. matrix M ?
